How many people are affected by Laing distal myopathy ?,"Although Laing distal myopathy is thought to be rare, its prevalence is unknown. Several families with the condition have been identified worldwide.",GHR,Laing distal myopathy
What are the genetic changes related to Laing distal myopathy ?,"Mutations in the MYH7
